tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE augmented_reality_feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE product_development (
    project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    feedback_id INT NOT NULL,
    feature_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (feedback_id) REFERENCES user_feedback (feedback_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (feature_id) REFERENCES augmented_reality_features (feature_id)
);

CREATE TABLE feedback_aggregation (
    aggregation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    feature_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    feedback_rating INT,
    feedback_date DATE
);
